attributes.action: Lobby Banks to reduce reserve fee charges i had 26 od allowed 150 charge 66 for 3 wks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Barclays Bankers Allowed me a reserve fee of 150 pounds - I went 30 + into the reserve and for the last 3 weeks they have charged me 22 pounds each week , a total now of 66 pounds - Obviously i have a cash flow problem but this is taking the mick what can you do about this

rejection.details:
Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/punitive/
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
